files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
# Miscellaneous
*.class
*.log
*.pyc
*.swp
.DS_Store
.atom/
.buildlog/
.history
.svn/

# IntelliJ related
*.iml
*.ipr
*.iws
.idea/

# The .vscode folder contains launch configuration and tasks you configure in
# VS Code which you may wish to be included in version control, so this line
# is commented out by default.
#.vscode/

# Flutter/Dart/Pub related
**/doc/api/
.dart_tool/
.flutter-plugins
.packages
.pub-cache/
.pub/
/build/
.gradle

# Android related
**/android/**/gradle-wrapper.jar
**/android/.gradle
**/android/captures/
**/android/gradlew
**/android/gradlew.bat
**/android/local.properties
**/android/**/GeneratedPluginRegistrant.java

# iOS/XCode related
**/ios/**/*.mode1v3
**/ios/**/*.mode2v3
**/ios/**/*.moved-aside
**/ios/**/*.pbxuser
**/ios/**/*.perspectivev3
**/ios/**/*sync/
**/ios/**/.sconsign.dblite
**/ios/**/.tags*
**/ios/**/.vagrant/
**/ios/**/DerivedData/
**/ios/**/Icon?
**/ios/**/Pods/
**/ios/**/.symlinks/
**/ios/**/profile
**/ios/**/xcuserdata
**/ios/.generated/
**/ios/Flutter/App.framework
**/ios/Flutter/Flutter.framework
**/ios/Flutter/Generated.xcconfig
**/ios/Flutter/app.flx
**/ios/Flutter/app.zip
**/ios/Flutter/flutter_assets/
**/ios/ServiceDefinitions.json
**/ios/Runner/GeneratedPluginRegistrant.*

# Exceptions to above rules.
!**/ios/**/default.mode1v3
!**/ios/**/default.mode2v3
!**/ios/**/default.pbxuser
!**/ios/**/default.perspectivev3
!/packages/flutter_tools/test/data/dart_dependencies_test/**/.packages
ios/Flutter/flutter_export_environment.sh

ios/Flutter/.last_build_id
ios/Flutter/Flutter.podspec

.flutter-plugins-dependencies

The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
copies or substantial portions of the Software.

THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR

files.name: README.md
analysis_options.yaml
files.content:
include: package:flutter_lints/flutter.yaml

analyzer:
  errors:
    mixin_inherits_from_not_object: ignore

linter:
  rules:
    library_private_types_in_public_api: false
    constant_identifier_names: false
    library_prefixes: false

files.name: pubspec.yaml
files.content:
name: gsy_flutter_demo
description: A new Flutter application by gsy

# The following defines the version and build number for your application.
# A version number is three numbers separated by dots, like 1.2.43
# followed by an optional build number separated by a +.
# Both the version and the builder number may be overridden in flutter
# build by specifying --build-name and --build-number, respectively.
# In Android, build-name is used as versionName while build-number used as versionCode.
# Read more about Android versioning at https://developer.android.com/studio/publish/versioning
# In iOS, build-name is used as CFBundleShortVersionString while build-number used as CFBundleVersion.
# Read more about iOS versioning at
# https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Reference/InfoPlistKeyReference/Articles/CoreFoundationKeys.html
version: 2.0.0+1

environment:
  sdk: '>=3.0.0 <4.0.0'

deferred-components:
  - name: crane
    libraries:
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_bubble_gum.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_button/anim_button_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_progress_img_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_scan_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_text_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/arc_seek_bar_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/bottom_anim_nav_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/canvas_click_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/chat_list_scroll_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/chat_list_scroll_demo_page_2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/color_progress_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/drag_img_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/gradient_text_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/index_stack_drag_card_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/index_stack_drag_card_demo_page2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/link_sliver/link_sliver_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/rich_text_demo_page2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/route_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/scroll_inner_content_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/align_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_bg_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_tip_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anima_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anima_demo_page2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anima_demo_page4.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anima_demo_page5.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/animation_container_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/blur_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/book_page/book_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/bubble/bubble_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/card_item_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/clip_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/cloud/cloud_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/controller_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/custom_multi_render_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/custom_pull/refrsh_demo_page3.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/custom_sliver/scroll_header_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/custom_viewport/custom_viewport_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/drop_select_menu/drop_select_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/floating_touch_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/honor_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/input_bottom_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/keyboard_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/list_anim/list_anim_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/list_anim_2/list_anim_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/overflow_image_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/particle/particle_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/positioned_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/refrsh_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/refrsh_demo_page2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/rich_text_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/scroll_listener_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/scroll_to_index_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/scroll_to_index_demo_page2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/silder_verify_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/sliver_list_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/sliver_stick_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/sliver_tab_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/sliver_tab_demo_page2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/sliver_tab/sliver_tab_demo_page3.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/statusbar_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/stick/stick_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/stick/stick_demo_page2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/stick_sliver_list_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/tag_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/matrix_custom_painter_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/text_line_height_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/text_size_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/tick_click_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/transform_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/verification_code_input_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/verification_code_input_demo_page2.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/viewpager_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/wrap_content_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/shader_canvas_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_switch_layout_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/vp_list_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/card_perspective_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/card_3d_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/card_real_3d_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/anim_juejin_logo_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/dash_3d_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/png_shadow_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/transform_canvas_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/juejin_3d_logo_demo_page.dart
      - package:gsy_flutter_demo/widget/juejin_3d_box_logo_demo_page.dart

dependencies:
  flutter:
    sdk: flutter

  # The following adds the Cupertino Icons font to your application.
  # Use with the CupertinoIcons class for iOS style icons.
  #cupertino_icons: ^1.0.3
  scroll_to_index: 3.0.1
  another_transformer_page_view: 2.0.0
  simple_animations: 5.0.2
  supercharged: 2.1.1
  matrix_gesture_detector : 0.2.0-nullsafety.1
  flutter_swiper_view : 1.1.8
  animated_text_kit : 4.2.1
  window_location_href: 1.0.0
  rive: 0.9.1
  animations: 2.0.4
  flutter_animate: ^1.0.0
  polygon: ^0.1.0
  zflutter:
    git:
      url: https://github.com/CarGuo/zflutter.git
      ref: 3f5e569ba96f4c94a5847aad96617f273d88629d
      path: zflutter/


  vector_math: any
dev_dependencies:
  build_runner: ^2.0.5
  build_web_compilers: ^3.0.0
  flutter_lints: 3.0.2
  flutter_test:
    sdk: flutter


# For information on the generic Dart part of this file, see the
# following page: https://dart.dev/tools/pub/pubspec

# The following section is specific to Flutter.
flutter:

  # The following line ensures that the Material Icons font is
  # included with your application, so that you can use the icons in
  # the material Icons class.
  uses-material-design: true

  # To add assets to your application, add an assets section, like this:
  assets:
    - static/
  #  - images/a_dot_ham.jpeg

  # An image asset can refer to one or more resolution-specific "variants", see
  # https://flutter.dev/assets-and-images/#resolution-aware.

  # For details regarding adding assets from package dependencies, see
  # https://flutter.dev/assets-and-images/#from-packages

  # To add custom fonts to your application, add a fonts section here,
  # in this "flutter" section. Each entry in this list should have a
  # "family" key with the font family name, and a "fonts" key with a
  # list giving the asset and other descriptors for the font. For
  # example:
  # fonts:
  #   - family: Schyler
  #     fonts:
  #       - asset: fonts/Schyler-Regular.ttf
  #       - asset: fonts/Schyler-Italic.ttf
  #         style: italic
  #   - family: Trajan Pro
  #     fonts:
  #       - asset: fonts/TrajanPro.ttf
  #       - asset: fonts/TrajanPro_Bold.ttf
  #         weight: 700
  #
  # For details regarding fonts from package dependencies,
  # see https://flutter.dev/custom-fonts/#from-packages

  fonts:
    - family: Canterbury
      fonts:
        - asset: assets/Canterbury.ttf

    - family: HelloStockholm
      fonts:
        - asset: assets/HelloStockholm.otf

    - family: Horizon
      fonts:
        - asset: assets/Horizon.otf

    - family: Bobbers
      fonts:
        - asset: assets/Bobbers.ttf

    - family: Agne
      fonts:
        - asset: assets/Agne.otf

    - family: bglbt
      fonts:
        - asset: assets/bglbt.ttf
